casebody.data:
COWART
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A., et al. No. 87P15-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 17, 2015. Sandra S. Cowart, Greensboro, for Cowart, Sandra S. Jason Kenneth Purser, Charlotte, for Shapiro & Ingle, LLP. Lauren Loftis, Charlotte, for Bank of America, N.A.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of June 2015 by Plaintiff to Order Urgent Permanent Preliminary Injunction Barring Sale of Home:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of June 2015."
